name: Cheque Ledger Report
query:
select j.cheque_no,g.debit,g.credit,j.cheque_date,g.posting_date,g.account as 'Accoount::200',g.voucher_no,g.name from `tabJournal Entry` j
left join `tabGL Entry` g on j.name=g.voucher_no
where g.voucher_type='Journal Entry' and j.docstatus=1 and not isnull(j.cheque_no) and j.cheque_no=%(cheque_no)s
Union All
(select p.reference_no,g.debit,g.credit,p.reference_date,g.posting_date,g.account,g.voucher_no,g.name from `tabPayment Entry` p
left join `tabGL Entry` g on p.name=g.voucher_no
where g.voucher_type='Payment Entry' and p.docstatus=1 and not isnull(p.reference_no) and p.reference_no=%(cheque_no)s)
Order by name
